**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Convergent Soldier](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2137) **Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 14 **Perception** +28 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10), [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36); convergent link **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +29, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +28 **Str** +6 **Dex** +5 **Con** +9 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 **Convergent Link** Creatures with this ability can communicate with each other by manifesting an aura of wispy [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36) runes. This has the effects of [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) with a range of 300 feet, but requires line of sight. **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [bastard sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15)_, Eagle Garrison badge, [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76) (20 arrows), _+1 [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_ --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +28 **Will** +25 **HP** 315 **Weaknesses** chaotic 10 **Disrupted Link** While a convergent soldier is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14), or [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), they lose their convergent link and convergent tactics abilities.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _bastard sword_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 2d8+12 slashing plus convergent tactics **Ranged** longbow +29 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8+9 piercing plus convergent tactics **Convergent Tactics** The convergent soldier's attacks deal an extra 4d8 damage to creatures within reach of one of their allies with convergent tactics. **Force Communication** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36) runes burst from the convergent soldier. Any creature [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) by the _convergence lattice_ who is within 100 feet of the convergent soldier and can see the runes must attempt a DC 34 Will save.
**Failure** For 1 round, the creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to creatures with the convergent link ability and counts as an ally with convergent tactics for the purposes of activating the convergent tactics ability.
**Critical Failure** As failure, and the creature is also [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round due to the information overload.
name: Convergent Soldier
